## CYCLOPS

![](images/cyclops.webp)

_Reclusive, one-eyed giants towering 20' high. They live simply on remote farmlands._

**AC** 11 (leather), **HP** 38, **ATK** 2 greatclub +7 (2d8) or 1 rock (far) +5 (1d12), **MV** double near, **S** +5 **D** +0 **C** +2 **I** -1 **W** -2 **Ch** +0, **AL** C, **LV** 8
